metadata.description: This exciting 56-page double feature issue contains two full-length stories, and continues the story from Omega Paradox #1! Valerius' crew tracked the Eye of Ancev to the Temple of Neak Prei, but fell victim to the Eretradium mercenaries who got there first! Can the team survive being split apart and the sudden appearance of a couple of strangers? Twice as many pages! Twice as many thrills! For less than twice the price!
metadata.name: Omega Paradox
